title: For sale or trade: Rare 1932 New York Giants Schedule Postcards - non-Hubbell
author: timn1

posts.post_title: For sale or trade: Rare 1932 New York Giants Schedule Postcards - non-Hubbell
posts.post_content:
I managed to win the lot of 9 in REA last night and will have a couple of dupes I would love to swap for ones I need, or otherwise, sell:

Vergez (I have an SGC30 and a PSA5.5 - I would consider moving either)

Hogan (would sell/trade either the one below from REA ungraded with "tiny ink marks on front and pencil on reverse, otherwise Vg" or a copy PSA labeled Authentic that's around Good condition overall and autographed by Hogan!)

Let me know if you have any interest in the set, or any to sell (other than Hubbell, of course) -

posts.post_title: For sale or trade: New York Giants Schedule Postcards
posts.post_content: Impossibly tough New York Giants Schedule Postcards - two available, described above.  LMK if you're interested and I'll shoot scans and prices to you-
